name: The Witch Trial
description:
In this game you play as an Inquisitor. The Lords of the Crown have brought before you a witch they believe to be manipulating the Sovereign. It's up to you who you choose to listen to and the fate of both the accused and the Lords.

A text based adventure made in Twine. This is my first Twine game and it is 3314 words in total. It's designed to be played in ten minutes or less (perfect for a coffee break!)
